channel.title: Experience on Brainwaves

item.title: The Way of the Blogger
item.description: Phew! I knew making a good website wasn’t easy. But I had 0 clue it was this hard. Tl Dr; Its almost as hard as choosing a background for your phone. You do, of course, have a full right to disagree. After all, even if you are a complete n00b like me in web dev, you must have created your first website in 15 minutes on wordpress. But thats the thing - its easy if you are using something like wordpress.
